(652)                           B. 90'08. March 30, 1908.-7-              Sanitarium, Cal., March 24, 1908. 

Elder J.A. Burden and Others Bearing Responsibilities at Loma Linda: 

Dear Brethren: 
     I feel a deep interest that careful study shall be given to the needs of our institution at Loma Linda, and that the right moves may be made. In the carrying forward of the work at this place, men of talent and of decided spirituality are needed.
